lines.text: It happened to me too!! I came back here and found my previous offering gone!
But fear not! I looked around and found them in the lone abandoned house on the road along the lake here...
No one has lived there for a long time, what's going on? The kids claimed its haunted but I managed to get my offering back there.
If you're not afraid, just follow the road and go up the hill to find the house. Good luck!
Beatriz: A haunted house? Seems worth investigating!
